name: Chansey
flavorText:
A rare and elusive
POKéMON that is
said to bring happiness to those
who manage to get
it.

previous.name: Rhydon
previous.flavorText:
Protected by an
armor-like hide,
it is capable of living in molten
lava of 3,600
degrees.

next.name: Tangela
next.flavorText:
The whole body is
swathed with wide
vines that are similar to sea­
weed. Its vines
shake as it walks.

pokemon.name: Happiny
pokemon.flavorText:
It loves round white things.
It carries an egg-shaped rock in
imitation of CHANSEY.

pokemon.name: Chansey
pokemon.flavorText:
A rare and elusive
POKéMON that is
said to bring happiness to those
who manage to get
it.

pokemon.name: Blissey
pokemon.flavorText:
Anyone who takes
even one bite of
BLISSEY's egg be­ comes unfailingly
caring and pleas­
ant to everyone.
